lead_paragraph: At eight years old, Taylor loses her mother to cancer. Her mom's dying wish is for Taylor to one day marry for love. Years later, Taylor has no love life, no job and no money. On a cross country bus trip, Taylor falls for Jimmy, the busdriver, but h
